resources.string: Pacman, our hero, munches his way around the map, eating all of the dots. However, life isn\'t easy for our young little hero. Along his journey, he faces SPOOKY ghosts who will try to hurt him. Avoid them! In each corner of the map, there is a power pellet. If Pacman eats a power pellet, he is temporarily gains the power to eat enemy ghosts.

Up: Swipe Up
Down: Swipe Down
Left: Swipe Left
Right: Swipe Right
 "Pause: Double Tap "
